thread.title: Bigg Boss 10 contestant Bani J and Yuvraj Thakur not together anymore? - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bigg Boss 10 contestant Bani J and Yuvraj Thakur not together anymore? - Times of India
text:
Popular VJ and host Bani J became the first runner-up of Bigg Boss 10 and was one of the most strongest contestants inside.
There have been reports about Bani dating 'Bade Acche Lagte Hain' actor Yuvraj Thakur and she did confirm of being in a relationship inside the house.
Yuvraj, even posted his feelings on Instagram and it was confirmed.
READ ALSO: Bigg Boss 10: Bani J's boyfriend Yuvraj finally confesses his love for her
But, guess there are some problems brewing between the two.
After coming out of the house, Bani flew to London to be with her mother and sister.
On the other hand, Yuvraj did a live chat from his gym and while replying to a fan he said "I am single". Furthermore, when someone asked him about Bani, he replied saying "I don't know where Bani is, she must be home."
Also, Bani's crypted tweet meant something. She recently tweeted " He tells Her, you're too real for the real world. I know, she says. I know. He tells Her, you're too real for the real world. I know, she says. I know. ⚡️
— Bani J⚡️ (@bani_j) February 12, 2017
